Lde/ecspride/MainActivity;->onCreate:(La: The method retrieves the device ID from TelephonyManager and stores it in a static field, which can be considered as originating, storing, and passing user personal data.
Lde/ecspride/ExampleFragment;->onAttach:: In the method onAttach of ExampleFragment, sensitive data (IMEI) is sourced from MainActivity and stored in ExampleFragment.
Lde/ecspride/ExampleFragment;->onActivit: The method sends an SMS message containing the IMEI of the device to a predefined phone number, which involves user personal data (IMEI).
